products.title: Genesis Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The genesis grey roller blind in a soft shade of grey will coordinate well with an array of colour palettes. The pale tone is great for pairing with monochrome interiors, or with muted pastels resulting in a light and uplifting look. This fabric roller blind is an understated window dressing that offers privacy and style whilst retaining a bright and airy feel within your space. products.title: Genesis Dark Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws.
